title: South Lamar Luxury, Walk to EVERYTHING
map_address: South lamar near Barton Springs rd
posting_body: Check out this 78704 modern apartment with a Austin twist.
Boasting walkability to South Lamar and its finest restaurants, bars and coffee shops with less than a 5 minute drive to downtown, it's the perfect place to land in town.
There is a impressive selection of amenities including a roof top pool, a 24-hour two story gym, yoga, pilates, barre studio and 2 community hangout lounges with amazing downtown views.
Your new home will have epicurean kitchen with quartz countertops, 42" Cabinets, Tile Backsplash and Integral Chrome Veggie Sprayer with Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances.
From the practical to the exquisite, this prime Austin location covers all your essentials..and way more!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
